comments:
I get this same stack dump (below) for the crash: "No more handles" see bug 17725.  I've had this "Item not added" crash twice in the last couple of weeks, the latest (today) with a pretty new version of Eclipse.

There are two stack dumps in that previous submission, the to one for an older Eclipse and the bottom one for the newer Eclipse.

There was a leak introduced in 3.2M2 which should be fixed in the latest
builds for 3.2M4.  Please re-open if you can reproduce this using a
newer build.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 117928 ***
*** Bug 123027 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
